name: Rocketeer Santa
description:
+++ Introduction

Christmas eve is near! But santa lost all the presents. Buckle up your jetback and let's go. Retrieve as much of the lost gifts as you can. But be aware: There are traps out there. But there is also help! You can spin the fortune wheel to earn extra lifes or get additional stars from it. With stars you can buy magnets or shields that help you.

The fortune wheel can only be spun 3 times a day.

This game was written as part of a 3 day game jam with father and son. Just having some fun. We are looking forward to your feedback and we already have a backlog for future features to come.

Credits for the music go to Michael Spect (www.soundspect.com) on OpenGameArt.com

+++ Controls

You can either use arrow up/down to control santa or use mouse clicks to target his movement.

+++ Links

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.deichkrieger.sleighride&hl=gsw&...

App Store: https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/rocketeer-santa/id1544000287

+++ The story

I developed this game together with my son. He came up with the ideas and the game design for it and we had a lot of fun finishing every before christmas :-)
